text: I have js based video app and I want to build recommendation system for the videos suggestion. I'm new to AI can anyone suggest how should I go about it? Also I want to stick with Julia as AI stack. Right now I'm serving random videos based on view count/likes(top famous, top location) etc

elements.text: I have js based video app and I want to build recommendation system for the videos suggestion. I'm new to AI can anyone suggest how should I go about it? Also I want to stick with Julia as AI stack. Right now I'm serving random videos based on view count/likes(top famous, top location) etc

text: How new to AI are you? Check out the <http://fast.ai|fast.ai> stuff. There is currently an effort to port everything to Julia. You can learn more about it in Discourse I think under the stream ml-ecosystem-coordination.
